scripts.preinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='node_modules/.cache';if(fs.existsSync(p)){try{fs.rmSync(p,{ recursive:true, force:true });console.log('Removed',p);}catch(e){console.warn('Could not remove',p,e.message);} }"
scripts.prebuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='node_modules/.cache';if(fs.existsSync(p)){try{fs.rmSync(p,{ recursive:true, force:true });console.log('Removed',p);}catch(e){console.warn('Could not remove',p,e.message);} }"
